input_text:
Job Title: Managing Director of Client Development - Legal Recruiting

Location: Washington DC-Baltimore Area

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Business Development, Consulting, Sales

Description:
Managing Director, Client Development  The role of the Director, Client Development is to source new and maintain existing in-house and law firm clients to introduce and sell our legal services. Role & Responsibilities Works with MLA Interim Legal Talent group leadership, Managing Directors (MD) and internal stakeholders to cultivate a strong understanding of the legal market with a particular emphasis on practice areas; business concerns affecting the management and efficiencies of law firms and corporate legal departments; the intersection between the legal and recruiting/search industries; and the strategic utilization of interim resources within these organizations.Needs to be client focused and driven.Builds and maintains a consultative and strategic relationship with clients.Assists in business development efforts within the corporate in-house legal community as well as the AmLaw and boutique law firm market within designated geographic markets. These efforts include cold calling, traditional and non-traditional networking efforts, online and social media branding, as well as internal collaboration to increase market awareness of the Interim Legal Talent group.Works with MLA Marketing to prepare and present client-specific business development material and presentations to prospective clients as well as general client meeting activity.Acts as Account Manager for assigned Interim Legal Talent clients and work with other Account Managers to identify top accounts, target skill sets and key market segments and to assess clients’ staffing needs.Works with Office Leaders and MDs to negotiate pricing and terms of service agreements and contracts with clients.Develops strong internal partnerships with recruiters, leadership and offices throughout Allegis Group and MLA to facilitate partnerships and account referrals.Communicates effectively with others in order to create a healthy and productive environment.Develops relationships with industry contacts to provide customer service, gain industry knowledge, and generate referrals and sales leads.Other duties as assigned.
Personal Style and CharacteristicsSmart, professional, confident, persuasive and has grit (perseverance).Entrepreneurial, assertive and driven, but with has a strong team orientation.High level of integrity and candor.Strong intellectual skills including superior written communication and presentation skills.Ability to establish rapport, relationships and credibility with candidates.Passion for learning.
Education and ExperienceB.A./B.S. required. J.D. is strongly preferred.1–2 years of experience within the legal or sales industries.Staffing experience, specifically with contract attorneys, is a plus.Experience working in a sales or consultative sales driven organization.

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level

output_json.title: Managing Director of Client Development - Legal Recruiting
output_json.summary: Role involves sourcing new and maintaining existing clients to introduce and sell legal services.
job_responsibilities: Works with leadership and internal stakeholders to cultivate understanding of the legal market.
Builds and maintains strategic client relationships.
Assists in business development efforts within specified markets.
Prepares and presents business development material.
Acts as Account Manager for assigned clients.
Identifies top accounts, targets skill sets, and assesses staffing needs.
Negotiates pricing and terms of service agreements.
Develops internal partnerships to facilitate account referrals.
Communicates effectively to create a productive environment.
Develops relationships with industry contacts for customer service and sales generation.
